## PublishingQueueExplorerInsightsPanelsExtensionsBuilder.register property

Registers a new insights panel.

**Signature:**

```typescript
register: (item: PublishingQueueExplorerInsightsPanelsExtension) => this;
```

## Remarks

This method only registers the insights panel and does not automatically make it visible in the application. To add the insights panel to the application, use [PublishingQueueExplorerInsightsPanelsExtensionsBuilder.config](./extensions.publishingqueueexplorerinsightspanelsextensionsbuilder.config.md)<!-- -->.
